reapack.name: RA-Add Envelope points based on markers within time selection.lua
reapack.desc: ADD Envelope points to selected envelope according to markers within time selection.

reapack.name: RA-ADD-Take_Marker_CHX_DUB_on_SELECTED_ITEMS.lua
reapack.desc: Add Take Marker named CHX-DUB to SELECTED ITEMS.

version.author: RESERVOIR AUDIO / Amel Desharnais, with AI.

reapack.name: RA-DOUBLAGE_COUNT_ITEMS_on_selected_track.lua
reapack.desc: COUNT the number of ITEMS on SELECTED TRACK.

reapack.name: RA-DOUBLAGE_COUNT_ITEMS_on_selected_track_within_time_selection.lua
reapack.desc: COUNT the number of ITEMS on SELECTED TRACK. (WITHIN TIME SELECTION)

reapack.name: RA-DOUBLAGE_Mute_WAV_track_&_UNMUTE_DUB+EDITED.lua
reapack.desc: MUTE WAV Track and UNMUTE DUB + EDITED named tracks.

reapack.name: RA-DOUBLAGE_Unmute_WAV_track_&_MUTE_DUB+EDITED.lua
reapack.desc: UNMUTE WAV track and MUTE DUB + EDITED named tracks.

reapack.name: RA-Keep Selected Items with 1ch only.lua
reapack.desc: KEEP SELECTION OF ITEMS with only 1 channel, unselect the rest.

version.author: MrBrock adapted from X-raym with AI. Original script prompted for user imput.

reapack.name: RA-Keep_selected_items_looped_longer_than_source.lua
reapack.desc: KEEP SELECTED ITEMS of clips beyond their source lenght, unselect the rest.

reapack.name: RA-Markers at item edges without overlap.lua
reapack.desc: Create MARKERS at edges of selected items, skipping item edges that overlap with others.

reapack.name: RA-Move selected items to first selected track within overlap threshold.lua
reapack.desc: MOVE SELECTED ITEMS to FIRST SELECTED TRACK. (Within an overlap threshold)

reapack.name: RA-Reduce_Take_Gain_by_a_Quarter.lua
reapack.desc: REDUCE numerical VALUE of TAKE GAIN 25%. (Partial Un-normalization)

reapack.name: RA-REMOVE syncronized overlapping ITEMS from SAME SOURCE (keeping the longest one).lua
reapack.desc: REMOVE syncronized overlapping ITEMS from SAME SOURCE (keeping the longest one)

reapack.name: RA-REMOVE_Take_Marker_CHX_DUB_on_SELECTED_ITEMS.lua
reapack.desc: REMOVES Take Markers named CHX-DUB to SELECTED ITEMS.

version.author: RESERVOIR AUDIO / Amel Desharnais, with AI.

reapack.name: RA-Rename Items based on Parent Source File Name.lua
reapack.desc: RENAME the active take of a SELECTED audio item, based on the name of the SOURCE file. (It works with sections or reversed sources)

version.author: Frankfante assembled with original scripts by Thonex, nofish and spk77

reapack.name: RA-Rename Items based on Source File Name.lua
reapack.desc: RESERVOIR AUDIO / This script renames the active take of an audio item based on the file name of the source file.

reapack.desc: Select NEXT top-level folder track

reapack.name: RA-Select PREVIOUS top-level folder track.lua
reapack.desc: Select PREVIOUS top-level folder track

reapack.desc: SET selected envelope points to PREVIOUS envelope point value.

reapack.name: RA-SET time selection to the selected item without moving edit cursor.lua
reapack.desc: SET time selection to the selected item without moving edit cursor.

reapack.name: RA-Swap item volume and take volume.lua
reapack.desc: SWAP the ITEM GAIN with TAKE GAIN.

reapack.name: RA-Unselect_Muted_Items.lua
reapack.desc: UNSELECT MUTED ITEMS among currently selected items.
